txt.en: Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-d청m to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.\n\nYour mission is to defeat Orc-defilers that have come out of Moria and destroy their cauldrons of blight.
Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-d청m to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath at Akr창z-zahar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'Our scouts have sighted a band of Orcs gathered at Durin's Stone. Even in the long absence of Durin's Folk, the Stone has resisted the Orcs' attempts to destroy it. However, it seems Orc-defilers have begun to blight the Dimrill Dale with their foul poisons. We cannot allow their corruption to spread beyond the halls of Khazad-d청m!

'You are to travel to the Dimrill Dale at once and defeat the Orc-defilers before it is too late!'
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
Your mission is to defeat Orc-defilers that have come out of Moria and destroy their cauldrons of blight.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath and travel to the Dimrill Dale.
'Very good, [placeholder]!\n\n'Let those foul Orcs cower in Moria! The Dimrill Dale shall never be theirs again!'
